quote: I needed to tell him, silently, that things might change, grow, or fail, but that life did go on. That we were all part of some great cycle, some pattern that it was only God's purpose to understand.
quote_letters: I NEEDED TO TELL HIM SILENTLY THAT THINGS MIGHT CHANGE GROW OR FAIL BUT THAT LIFE DID GO ON THAT WE WERE ALL PART OF SOME GREAT CYCLE SOME PATTERN THAT IT WAS ONLY GODS PURPOSE TO UNDERSTAND
